94513.これで 白梅の枝と\n薄紅の宝貝が そろった！\n<br>\n湯の花をもらうため:
Now we have Plum Branch and Light Red Shell! Let's go to the caretaker's hut in Moncello Spring Gorge, which is southwest of Coniware
Plain, to get some hot water!

78125.「海岸沿いに建つ ログハウスに\n シノンっていう若い女の子が 住んでてさ。\n:
There was a young girl named Sinon living in a log cabin along the coast. She was really cute when I saw her. I might ask her if she wants
to surf with me next time. Maybe I'll ask her to surf with me. I'm sure she'd love to see my surfing skills.

92340.「このログハウスに シノンっていう\n 若い女の子が 住んでてさ。\n よく見た:
There was a young girl named Sinon living in this log cabin. She was really cute when I saw her. I might ask her if she wants to surf with
me next time. Maybe I'll ask her to surf with me. I'm sure she'd love to see my surfing skills.

84835.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「んふふっ<he:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><heart> I got a really nice bone as a gift the
other day! I wonder what kind of voice it will
sing in. I'm really looking forward to it<heart>

78126.「このログハウスに シノンっていう\n 若い女の子が 住んでてさ。\n 思い切っ:
There is a young girl named Sinon living in this log cabin. I took a chance and asked her to go surfing with me. But she didn't have a
pulse. She was rejected by her boyfriend like Mero Mero.

78128.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「はわわ！ 今の聞かれちゃった！？\n ま:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Huh! Did he just hear that? Oh no. I had
decided not to tell anyone about my memories
of Ryu-chan.<bw_break>

78129.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「そうだ！ 私の:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>That's right! Do me a favor and I'll tell you
about Ryu-chan! Hey, will you do me a favor?<yesno><break>

78130.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ええーっ？ 私の恋:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>What? You mean that my earlier line that
overflowed from my love for you was not
listened to? Oh no, no! I'm so embarrassed!

78131.「彼……リュウちゃんと出会ったのは\n 誰もいない 早朝の浜辺を\n ひとりで:
I met Ryu-chan when I was taking a walk alone on an empty early morning beach. He stood still among the waves, staring at me, and
leaned in close without saying a word. It was a fateful encounter. It didn't take long for us to understand each other. Ryu loves to
sing. But there was one problem. He's a shy boy and he's too shy to sing in front of me! So I have a favor to ask you. I need you to
bring me a tool to get Ryu to sing. It's called Hell's File. It is often dropped by <%sev_que_name0> in the cave of Coniware
Plain. With Hell's File, even Ryu would have to sing. You'll accept my request, won't you?

78132.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「キャーッ！ や:
Crikey! I did it! Thanks! Now, when you find Hell's File, come see me. I'll pay you back. Mmm-hmm. I know I was rough on Kunai, but it's
the only way I can get him to sing. I'm looking forward to Ryu's song so much!

78133.「キャーッ！ やった！ ありがとっ！\n ……って 返事は うれしいけど\n あ:
Crikey! I did it! Thanks! I'm happy to hear back from you, but it seems you've got your hands full with other people's requests. I
felt a little sentimental, but that's okay. When you're done with the others, come visit me! I promise!

78134.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ええーっ？ 約束が:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>What? That's not what we agreed to! I can't
just listen to some hot gal's love stories and
never hear from her again!

78136.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「まあ！ あなた また盗み聞き？\n おカ:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Well! Are you eavesdropping again? You have
pretty good taste for someone who looks so
serious.<bw_break>

79481.「前にも言ったけど リュウちゃんのこと\n 知りたいなら 私のお願い 聞いてもら:
I told you before, if you want to know about
Ryu, you'll do me a favor! Will you do me a
favor?<yesno><break>

79482.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「あのね 私とリ:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>You know, me and Ryu-chan are... Did you just
say no? I can't wait to talk to you!

78137.「運命的な出会いを果たした 私とリュウちゃん。\n だけど リュウちゃんは 心を:
I had a fateful encounter with Ryu-chan.
However, Ryu-chan is still not open to me and
won't sing her favorite song in front of me.<open_irai><bw_break>

78138.「そこで あなたに お願いがあるの。\n リュウちゃんに 歌を歌ってもらうため\:
So I have a favor to ask you. I need you to bring a tool for Ryu-chan to sing a song. It's called Hell's File. It is often dropped by
<%sev_que_name0> in the cave of Coniware Plain. With Hell's File, even Ryu will have to sing. Make sure you bring it with you!

78139.「あっ！ あなた\n じごくのヤスリを持っているじゃない！？\n ねえねえ それ:
Oh, you have Hell's File! You have Hell's
File! Hey, hey, hey. You're gonna give it to
me, right?

78140.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ええっ！ 私のため:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Eh! Didn't you prepare this for me? C'mon!
Sinon no baka baka you fast Chiri! Ryu-chan
will laugh at you like that!

78141.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「そうそう！ 私:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Yes, yes! What I wanted was this very
dangerous tool! Thank you, traveler! Here's a
little something for you!

78142.「うふふ……。このヤスリで\n ゴリゴリすれば リュウちゃんだって 観念して\n:
Hmmm. I'm sure Ryu-chan will give in and sing in a nice voice. What's with your eyes? You seem to have something to say. Eh? Are you
telling me to stop doing such a terrible thing with a tool I brought?

78143.<icon_exc>「あーっ！ ひょっとして もしかすると\n あなた リュウち:
Ahh..! By any chance, could it be that I frightened you into thinking that I was going to make you sing? I see! Hahahahaha! Well, I
have to explain, don't you think? I'm sorry about that! Ryu-chan is driftwood, Ryu-boku! The Hell's File that you brought me is used to
shave driftwood into instruments! I'm an instrument maker who can hear the voices of the children who will be the material of the
instrument. I can make them into the instrument they want to be. I was taking a walk on the beach once, and I came across a
very shapely piece of driftwood that looked like he had a nice singing voice. And I really wanted him to sing. Besides, it's impossible
for me to fall in love with a man! I'm all about the instrument, and I'm a lover of the instrument. People who don't make a sound are
boring. Alright, then, let's get on with it and make Ryu-chan squeal and squeal! Hmmm...

78144.シノンに じごくのヤスリを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><brea: Would you like to give Hell's File to Sinon?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

92341.シノンは その場で リュウちゃんを\nスリスリして ゴリゴリしはじめた。<se:
Sinon began thrashing and groping Ryu-chan on
the spot.<se MQ_013_1 0>

90324.「オレさ 前に このログハウスに住んでる\n シノンっていう女の子を 波乗りに\:
I once asked a girl named Sinon who lives in this log cabin to go surfing with me. I heard that she is a genius instrumentalist who gets
orders from the Gran Zedora royal family! Wow~ She must have been amazingly talented. As expected of me, I don't have the confidence to
ride such a big wave.

90325.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ハァ……。ク: <attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Ha. Master Black. I need to see you right now.

90326.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「……ああ。いつぞやの旅人さん。\n いつ:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Ah. When were you there, Mr. Traveler? How
long have you been there?<bw_break>

90327.「ふぅ ダメね。いつもの調子が出ないわ。\n 私 どうしちゃったのかしら。\n:
Phew, I can't do it. I'm not in my usual
groove. What's wrong with me? Hey, traveler,
will you listen to me?<yesno><break>

90328.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そう……。冷たいの:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Yes. It's cold. Like the gaze of a flounder
sleeping in the deep sea.

90329.「先日 ある男の人が 私の家を訪ねてきたの。\n 今回は 流木とか そんなんじゃ:
The other day a man came to my house. It wasn't driftwood or anything like that this time. It was a real, live human being. I
looked into his eyes, which reminded me of the deep, clear ocean, and I felt a myriad of ''Nazumas'' running before my eyes. Yes, like a
harbinger of a storm. I've always said I'm a ''instrumental lover,'' but I've never felt such a tightness in my chest. Could this be true
love? But the time I spent talking with him passed in an instant. He asked me to make him a certain flute, and then he disappeared like
a distant shadow. I'll see him again when it's finished, but that flute is a knacker. It is more difficult to make than any other
instrument I have ever undertaken. First and foremost, there are some materials that I just can't get on my own.

90330.<icon_exc>「そ…そうだわ！\n あなたのチカラを借りれば もしかしたら:
That's right! With your help, maybe I can finish that flute! Hey, traveler! Please! Can you go get the materials I need to make the
flute so I can meet my beloved Master Kuro? I'll pay you back!

90331.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「キャーッ！ や:
Crikey! I did it! Thank you! I'm starting to feel more energetic now that I have a glimmer of hope! Okay, I'll tell you about the
materials you need to gather! There are two materials needed to make the flute. <%sev_que_name4> and Old Dragon Bone.
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4> should be relatively easy to find, so you can procure it as you like. Old Dragon Bone can be obtained by killing
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Gran Zedora Territory. Old Dragon Bone is a rare and fantastic material.It may be tough to deal with
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, but think of it as saving a girl in love and do your best!

90332.「キャーッ！ やった！ ありがとっ！\n ……って 返事は うれしいけど\n あ:
Crikey! I did it! Thank you! I'm happy to hear that, but you've got your hands full with other people's requests. It seems my love life
has come to an end. Okay. I'm sulking in my bed like a kelp on the beach.

90333.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そう……。私の恋も:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Yes, I know. Looks like my love life ends
here. That's okay. I'm sulking in my bed like
a kelp on the beach.

90334.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ハァ……。私: <attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Huh. My Black-sama. Where are you now?

90335.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「ああ 旅人さん 来てくれたんだ。\n も:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Ah, traveler, you came. Will you listen to me
again?<yesno><break>

90336.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そう……。冷たいの:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Yes. It's cold. Like the gaze of a pot lurking
behind a rock.

91430.「私ね ある男の人に 恋してしまったの。\n だけど 彼は ある笛の製作を依頼す:
I fell in love with a man. But he disappeared like a distant shadow when I asked him to make a certain flute. If I can complete the flute,
I can see him again, but there are some materials needed for it that I can't gather on my own. That's why I need your help! In order
to meet my beloved Master Black, will you help me gather the materials I need to make the flute? I'll pay you back!

90337.「愛しのクロ様に もう一度 会うため\n 私 彼に頼まれた笛を 完成させてみせる:
In order to see my beloved Master Black again,
I will complete the flute he asked me to make.
You're going to help me gather the materials.<open_irai><bw_break>

90338.「笛作りに 必要な材料は 全部でふたつ。\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と:
You will need two materials to make a flute. <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> and Old Dragon Bone. The <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> should be relatively easy to
find, so you can procure it as you like. Old Dragon Bone can be obtained by killing <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Gran Zedora Territory.

90339.<close_irai>「古竜の骨は 幻の素材と呼ばれる逸品。 \n <%sEV:
Old Dragon Bone is a gem of a material that is called a phantom material.It may be tough to deal with <%sev_que_name0>, but think of it as
saving a girl in love and do your best!

92324.「このログハウスには\n シノンっつう 天才楽器職人が住んでんだけど\n 最近:
There's a genius instrument maker named Sinon living in this log cabin, but lately he's been acting kind of strange. He's sitting on the
beach, and when I wondered what he was doing, I saw that he'd written Suki or something on the beach! I heard he's a lover of the
instrument, but what happened to him?

90340.「まあっ 古竜の骨を 手に入れたのね！\n やっぱり あなたに頼んで 正解だった:
Oh, you received Old Dragon Bone! I knew it
was a good thing I asked you! You look like
you're really good at dragon hunting!<open_irai><bw_break>

90341.「でも 材料は 全部 一緒に受け取るから\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>も:
But we'll pick up all the materials together,
so <%sev_que_name4> can you come again?<bw_break>

90342.「まあっ 私がお願いした 材料が\n 全部 そろっているじゃない！\n ねえねえ:
Oh, all the materials I asked for are here!
Hey, will you hand them over to me right away?

90343.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そう……。冷たいの:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Yes. It's cold. Like the gaze of a
bloodthirsty Great White Shark.

90344.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「キャーッ！ あ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Crikey! Thank you, traveler! As long as I have
this, I can finish the flute he asked me to
make! Here's a little something for you!

91824.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「でもね……:
But between you and me, I'm not sure if I can make the flute as he asked me to. When he asked me to make the flute, he gave me
detailed instructions on how to make it, but I don't think it will make a decent sound. The materials he used are not even related to
flutes. But I think that's all part of his charm, including his mysterious and mysterious closures! Now, I'm going to do my best to make
a flute! I'll be waiting for you, Mr. Black. I'll work on the flute and the woman too before I meet you.

92422.<close_irai>「恋する乙女を救うと思って\n どうか もうひとつの材料:
<close_irai>Please, in the interest of saving the damsel
in love, I'd like to add one more ingredient
to the list!

90345.<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と 古竜の骨を\nシノンに 渡しますか？<yes: <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> and Old Dragon Bone to Sinon?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

90346.<pc>は シノンに\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と古竜の骨を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Sinon <%sev_que_name4> and
Old Dragon Bone!

90347.「ウワサによると シノンが\n フツーの男に 恋してるらしいじゃんか。\n<br:
Rumor has it that Sinon is in love with a normal guy. Well, a long-haired guy was looking for Sinon before. Maybe he's his
girlfriend's. If that's the case, Sinon is in trouble!There's a saying about long-haired dudes that they're stinky pick-up artists!I'm
the one with the long hair. I'm sure of it!

90348.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「私のお願い 聞:
Thanks for doing what I asked! Thanks to you, I can start working on the flute that Master Black asked me to make! I'm a little unsure if
I'll be able to make a flute that makes a decent sound with the way he said. I'll do anything to meet him! Well~, I'll do my best
to make the flute! Wait for me, Mr. Black. I'll work on my woman as well as my flute before I meet you.

100332.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><icon_e:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><icon_exc>Hey. That thing you're holding, isn't that the
Wonder Flute I made for Master Black with all
my love?<yesno><break>

100333.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「うそ！ そんな:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>No way! Even if I said that, there's no way I
could have made a mistake!<bw_break>

100334.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ああ……クロ様:
Oh, Master Black, what a sinful person you are. How could he so easily give the whistle, the very object of my love, to someone else?
Do you know Master Black? Then tell me about Master Black! Then I'll forgive you!

100335.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「私が クロ様の:
You have a flute that I made with love for Master Black, so you must know him, right? Tell me more about Master Black! Then I'll
forgive you!

76027.「そこの家に住んでる シノンちゃんは\n かなり変わった女の子だよ。\n<br>:
Sinon, who lives there, is a very strange girl. Even at her age, she doesn't dress up and enjoys collecting all kinds of strange
things. Sometimes I hear strange noises.

84833.<if_woman>「このような 開放的な場所で仕事をしていると\n 調子に乗っ:
When I work in such an open space, I am often approached by gentlemen who are in high spirits. Hmmm. Be careful of the wolves of
Lendersia.Oh, no. You came all the way in here to invite me to surf? Hmmm. I'm not such a light-hearted woman that I would readily accept such an
invitation. I'm sorry.

76028.「ここの海は キレイだろ？\n だから けっこう いろんな所から\n 人が やっ:
The sea here is beautiful, isn't it? That's
why people come from all over the place.

76029.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「行方不明になっ:
Princess Anlucia of Gran Zedora Kingdom, who had gone missing, has returned to the castle as a hero. Word spread very quickly, even in
such a remote beach. No, it's really a happy thing! Oh? Speaking of which, who's behind you? Oh, no way, huh?

84834.「見ての通り 宿屋というには忍びないけどさ\n 潮風と 波の音を ダイレクトに味:
As you can see, it's not much to call it an inn, but please take your time and rest while directly enjoying the sea breeze and the sound
of the waves!

127734.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この職場は リ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>This place has a resort feel to it, so it's a
top favorite amongst the dharma priests. I won
it in an amiibi lottery!
